author: yegor
msg: refactored POIXMLFactory and related classes; simplified XSSFRelation - now it's just a set of definitions of XSSF relations, all read/load stuff is not used anymore and was removed. Also, removed Workbook.getCustomPallete() - it's OLE-specific

author: veithen

* Changed the testkit to detect transport errors in the listeners without waiting for timeout.
